title: Spike in 5-star reviews after TikTok mention
suggestedAction: Boost TikTok post and reply to top comments.

title: Website checkout abandonment rate increased by 15%
suggestedAction: Investigate potential user experience issues in the checkout process.

title: New competitor offering similar product at lower price
suggestedAction: Evaluate pricing strategy and consider a limited-time promotional offer.

title: Customer support tickets for 'login issues' up 20%
suggestedAction: Review recent code deployments related to user authentication.

title: Blog post "Top 5 Summer Trends" performance exceeded expectations
suggestedAction: Plan follow-up content on a similar topic and share on social media.

title: Seasonal forecast shows a 30% increase in demand for waterproof jackets
suggestedAction: Increase stock of waterproof jackets by 25% for Q3.

title: Email campaign 'Summer Sale' open rate is below average
suggestedAction: A/B test different subject lines and send a follow-up email.

title: Server response time for product pages has slowed by 1.2 seconds
suggestedAction: Review recent code deployments and database queries for performance bottlenecks.

title: Positive sentiment analysis on social media about new product launch
suggestedAction: Engage with positive mentions and share user-generated content.
